name: The Publisher War
description:
This board game project was done in the end of the 1st semester. The goal was to make a game in one week using the universe of Jules Verne.

We had to form a group of 6 and pick two randoms tags in a tag-pool in order to give us constraints in the game we had to create. The tags we had were "Resources" and "Management".

Name : "The Publisher's War"

Objective of the game : As a publisher, you have to publish 5 novels of Jules Verne by travelling the world and doing ressource trading to gain money.  Each novel can be published on the differents points on the world map. These points are described as Cities. 

The more money you spend on the publishing, the more point you gain. The one who got the best score at the end of the game win.

Rules (French) :  (See download under)

Project made with :  https://aurelien-pecatte.itch.io/, https://valentinmornet.itch.io/
